name: Grapple Demon
description:
The successor to SKYDEMON, Grapple Demon challenges players to get to the end of the map, high up in the sky, practically heaven. 

This game was heavily inspired by Pogostuck so I definitely do expect players to get upset since this is a hard game, will be happily surprised if there are any real gamers who can beat this!

Check out @Hanzil on Instagram who made the music for this game!
